item.description:
This year it's going to be bigger and better!!!

27 Mile Ride with option to ride further that day.

This ride takes us through the beautiful towns of Concord, Carlisle, and others....

We pass by some beautiful farms along the way!

This event is supported by the Obsessive Compulsive Foundation of Boston.

**Rain Date Sunday, September 13, 2009

Please bring $10 on the day of the ride. $5 will go toward the OC Foundation...a very worthwhile cause and the other $5 will go toward maintaining this website. If you are able to gain further pledges, 100% of those will go directly toward the OC Foundation.

Please make sure that you bring a bike in good working order. Helmets are highly recommended!
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the ride 617-894-8454
item.name: 2nd Annual OCD (Obsessive Compulsive Disorder) Fundraiser
